title: My entire team had 5k ping
body: Im pretty pissed rn, was playing a game and around 7 min in BOOM everyone in game has 3k-7k ping for like 5 min! riot plz! and enemy team didnt have it that bad, some of them were playing fine so they got a HUGE advantage and won the game, only because of the lag.... My brother is also experiencing it right now as i wirite this. riot please.... i want my lose to go away xD my lp is to 0 now

replies.body:
Was everyone who got hit with those ping spikes on the same network or in the same area? I only ask because you mentioned your brother having the same type of lag and it sounded as if he was in the match with you too. That might mean something was going on with your ISP or the network stability in your area, but regardless let's go ahead and troubleshoot a bit to cover some basics.

Go ahead and make a couple adjustments to your Port Forwarding and DNS settings to see if we can get you a smoother link to our game servers. If you aren't sure how to make those changes, check out those two steps in our [**connection guide**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) and test them in a custom/practice match.

Yea, i have had 50 ping all day and all of a sudden right now I have 800 ping. I have check and my internet is A-Okay. My brother is watching twitch and playing battlefield and my girlfriend is watching netflix with no issues. I even ran a speed test and im over 300 download with 10 ping. Not sure why I am lagging in league.
